"A Wild Easter 2":
"This is an unofficial request from me, Xie!
We're holding an Easter celebration at the
Quarry on planet Lillipa again this year!
...At least, that was the plan, but a bunch
of angry Darkers and Mechs showed up
and went on a rampage!
I need as many ARKS as I can get!
Will you help us drive off these enemies?
――――――――――――――――――――
Fail: Time limit expires"
"Remove the obstacles and head to the final area!"

"The chain of command
is going to be a little bit
unusual for this operation...
But a mission is a mission!
Do your best out there!"

"As for your objective, a lot
of enemies have appeared
at the Easter party venue,
and I want you to repel them."

"Let me just check the enemy
readings in your area...
Woah, when did all those get
here?! Be careful, everyone!!"
